Articles.Content:
Hey guys, sorry for being out so long. But from now on, I'll try to be more active! I've wanted to come back on for a while now, it was eating my brains just thinking about it. But anyway, hello again guys!

(not quite sure if this is the right subforum to put this in, but I just put it in here for now)

Here's fine, but technically it could go in the "Welcome Aboard" section. Maybe a moderator will put it there, who knows?

Welcome back!

Welcome back!

Thanks! I put it here because the "welcome aboard" section is limited to one post to user. Soo yeah.
